lyrics:
14 contributorsi wish you knew lyricsintro
doo doo doo doo doo
doo
i just wish you knew doo doo
how much i still love you doo doo

verse 1
ive got to see you
wherever you are
and ive got to be there
im wishing on stars

but the words escape me
and im paralyzed
so helpless when i
look into your eyes

chorus
and how i wish you only knew
what i feel inside for you
you probably havent got a clue
but i wish you knew
how i love you baby
how i love you how i love you

verse 2

to want you so badly
but keep it concealed
see my inferiority complex kicks in
and the words escape me
and im paralyzed
so helpless when i
look into your eyes
chorus
and how i wish you only knew
what i feel inside for you
you probably havent got a clue

spoken bridge

to want somebody so bad
that nothing and nobody
can ever seem to fill that void
that is the situation that im talking about right now
and if you feel me
sing the song with me
come on
